name: Get Reverse Email
description: Find all domains registered or managed by a specific email address through DomainTools Iris Investigate API. Discover domain portfolios, registrant connections, and related infrastructure by analyzing WHOIS email contacts for threat actor attribution and investigation

email.description: The email address to search for in WHOIS records (e.g., admin@example.com)

limit_exceeded.description: Indicates if the API response limit per page has been exceeded

has_more_results.description: Indicates if additional results are available beyond the current response

message.description: Status message from DomainTools API (e.g., 'Enjoy your data.')

results_count.description: Number of domains associated with the email in the current response

total_count.description: Total number of domains linked to the queried email address

results.description: Array of domains where the email appears in WHOIS records as registrant, administrative, technical, or billing contact

missing_domains.description: Array of domain names that were queried but not found in the DomainTools database
